channel.title: Teleport Animation Help
channel.description: I've been trying to add the teleporting animation to my ::home command, but I'm not quite sure how. I just started coding not too long ago, and I'm having a few problems. If you could help, that would be great. Thanks.

item.title: Teleport Animation Help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

every time you edit the code it comes out looking like shit.
it’s all spaced un evenly.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport Animation Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:3, topic:408052”] if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { if (c.inWild()) { return; } else { c.getPA().startTeleport(X, Y, 0, "modern"); }

Fixed.
np[/quote]

if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do that in the wilderness!"); return; } else { c.getPA().startTeleport(X, Y, 0, "modern"); }
yw

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport Animation Help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

			if (playerCommand.equals("home")) {
				if (c.inWild()) {
					return;
				} else {
					c.getPA().startTeleport(X, Y, 0, "modern");
				}

Fixed.
np

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport Animation Help
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

			if (playerCommand.equals("home")) {
				if (c.inWild())
				return;
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3086, 3493, 0, "modern");

Np.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport Animation Help

item.description:
@Rectification wrote:

I’ve been trying to add the teleporting animation to my ::home command, but I’m not quite sure how. I just started coding not too long ago, and I’m having a few problems. If you could help, that would be great. Thanks.
